scenes.description: MC section where Hoshimachi Suisei interacts with the audience and introduces the next song.
Static information screen displaying details for the 'Midnight Grand Orchestra 1st LIVE OVERTURE' concert.

subtitles.original: 皆さん！もっともっと盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Let's get more and more excited!

subtitles.original: 次のご機嫌なナンバーを聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen to the next upbeat number.
